The Oblitercons/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Anubis/Hades:


::Dark One nodded as Hiss told him of the history of the ship::

"It is a M-16 Class Prison Ship.  Made for long distance journeys for a few 
dangerous criminals.  As far as I can tell, from the ship's damaged data 
logs, somehow the three fugitives got out, and in a struggle, the ship 
crashed here.  Hell Beast used it as a very temporary base with the struggle 
against Megatron.  I believe it can fly once more.  Though, it will take 
extreme amounts of work."

"Very well, Hiss.  You and Scavenger shall begin to work on it, I will take 
Pyro and Ominous with me.(I don't know if he followed the Oblitercons still, 
so if he didn't, nevermind about this), we will get Pyro repaired, recieve 
orders, and swing by here when we ware finished." Dark One said, motioning 
for Ominous to follow, Dark One carrying Pyro, walking towards the Alliance 
base.

============

::Injector approached the Predacon base, two autoguns popping up and firing 
on him::
"Slag!" the fuzor yelled, falling back, while he was using Double Punch and 
Manterror as shields against the fire::  
::he soon got behind a large boulder, setting down Double Punch and 
Manterror, resting sa the autoguns broke small pieces off of the boulder::
"Slag, slag, slag, slag!" ::he yelled, pulling out his stinger missile 
launcher, leaping to the left, firing off two stinger missiles at one of the 
autoguns, landing behind another boulder::

=============

::Anubis leapt into the air, attempting to slam his entire body weight 
against Inferno::

::Hades laughed, firing off three shots from his laser rifle at Rampage::
